author: harsh
msg: HADOOP-7975. Add LZ4 as an entry in the default codec list, missed by HADOOP-7657 (harsh)

author: kkolinko
msg: Remove Javadoc for removed method. (Fixes javadoc compiler warning)
Fix Javadoc formatting. (Thought there is still more to fix there).

author: kkolinko
msg: When building a Windows installer apply fixcrlf only after all files has been copied.
The difference is what line ends the INSTALLLICENSE and tomcat.nsi files will have.
Some NSIS docs [1] mention that license file must have CRLF line ends.

author: kkolinko
msg: When building a Windows installer do not copy whole "res" folder to output/dist, but only the files that we need. I have noticed those unneeded files (manifest templates, checkstyle configuration etc.) when reviewing RAT report prepared by ASF Buildbot.
